item.title: Rainbow Agents ICLS 2020 Symposium
item.description: Reframing Playful Participation in Museums: Identity, Collaboration, Inclusion We organized a sequence of semi-structured interviews between pairs of complementary projects paying attention to identity, collaboration and inclusion among visitor-learners. Leilah Lyons, Tony Pellicone, Angela Booker Matthew Berland, Basak Helvaci Ozacar, Stephen Uzzo Maxine McKinney de Royston, Robb Lindgren, Vishesh Kumar, James Planey
